snippet: Suicide bombers and gunmen struck the Afghan capital and three provinces in a clear attempt to erode confidence in NATO and Afghan military gains.
abstract: Taliban suicide bombers and gunmen barrage the diplomatic quarter and the Parliament in Kabul, Afghanistan, and strike three eastern provinces as well; complex attack is clearly designed to undermine confidence in NATO and Afghan military gains.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN, GRAHAM BOWLEY and SANGAR RAHIMI
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Matthew Rosenberg and Jawad Sukhanyar from Kabul, and employees of The New York Times from Nangarhar and Khost Provinces.

lead_paragraph: Suicide bombers and gunmen struck the Afghan capital and three provinces in a clear attempt to erode confidence in NATO and Afghan military gains.

headline.seo: Taliban Launch Coordinated Attacks Across Afghanistan
headline.main: Complex Attack by Taliban Sends Message to the West
headline.print_headline: Complex Attack By Taliban Sends Message To West
